[ 11] The 36-item tool measures emotional, physical, social, emotional, functional health and the symptoms specific to lung cancer. With Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale, the measurement of mood is carried out. [ 12] This 14-item tool consists of 2 subscales for depression and anxiety. This is a kind of categorical scale, and cut-off scores for each subscale are as follows: 0 to 7 represents normal, 8 to 10 represents mild, 11 to 14 represents moderate, and 15 to 21 represents severe.
